page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content: Llandyrnog does not have many recreational facilities. The following are some of the important outlets for recreational activities. {Football (soccer). There are two teams Llandyrnog and Llandyrnog reserves. They play in the clwyd league. In summer league involving the surrounding villages of Rhewl Trefnant Llanfair Ysceifiog and Bodfari. Llandyrnog are often the winners of the competition . Village hall_festival (see Eisteddfod) Fetes coffee mornings whist_drive Youth club (see clubs) pub dart_The white Horse Inn and the Golden Lion both have dart teams.Playing field_The village has a playing field for children containing a plank_swing swings slide see_saw football pitch and 2 concrete tennis courts.
